rules: Rule1: If a driver is employed for a job, then either the driver has access to a facility or the driver has permission for a facility.
Rule2: Provided that a driver is contracted for a job, either the driver has access to a facility or the driver has permission for a facility.
Rule3: Either a driver is full time or a driver is employed for a job or a driver is contracted for a job.
Rule4: A vehicle follows routes or a vehicle follows a schedule.
Rule5: Under the condition that a vehicle follows a schedule, the vehicle is compliant.
Rule6: If a vehicle has a GPS, then if the vehicle follows routes, the vehicle is compliant.
Rule7: Provided that a vehicle has a navigator, if the vehicle follows routes, the vehicle is compliant.
Rule8: A vehicle is overloaded or a vehicle has a GPS or a vehicle has a navigator.
Rule9: If a vehicle has a weight limit, then it is not the case that the vehicle is overloaded.
Rule10: A vehicle has a weight limit or a vehicle has a capacity check system.
Rule11: Whenever a vehicle has a capacity check system, the vehicle is not overloaded.
Rule12: Under the condition that a vehicle violates regulations, the vehicle has a violation.
Rule13: If a vehicle has a violation, the vehicle gets fined.
Rule14: If a driver passes a breathalyzer, it is not the case that the driver is sober.
Rule15: Whenever a driver shows sobriety, the driver is not sober.
Rule16: Provided that a driver takes a test, the driver passes a breathalyzer.
Rule17: A driver takes a test or a driver demonstrates sobriety.
Rule18: Under the condition that a facility operates from a facility, a driver requires a license.
Rule19: A facility operates from a facility or a vehicle transports alcohol.
Rule20: Provided that a driver uses a mobile app, either the vehicle has a GPS or the vehicle has a navigator.
Rule21: A driver uses a mobile app or a driver uses a company device.
Rule22: If a device has connectivity to a network, then if a driver uses a company device, the vehicle has a GPS or the vehicle has a navigator.
Rule23: A supervisor monitors compliance of a vehicle or a supervisor checks documents.
Rule24: If a supervisor checks documents, then if the vehicle violates regulations, the vehicle gets fined.
Rule25: Whenever a supervisor reviews logs, if the vehicle violates regulations, the vehicle gets fined.
Rule26: If a vehicle transports alcohol, then either a driver has a job or if the vehicle is not compliant, the vehicle uses a platform.
Rule27: A driver reports an incident or if it is not the case that if a supervisor monitors compliance of a vehicle, the supervisor reviews logs, then the supervisor issues a warning.
Rule28: If an investigator confirms the truth of a report, it is not the case that the driver reports an incident.
Rule29: An investigator confirms the truth of a report or an investigator verifies facts.
Rule30: Whenever an investigator interviews witnesses, if the investigator verifies facts, the driver does not report an incident.
Rule31: If a sensor detects alcohol, it is not the case that the driver fails a test.
Rule32: A sensor detects alcohol or a sensor alerts a system.
Rule33: Under the condition that a sensor alerts a system, the system notifies security.
Rule34: Whenever a system triggers an alarm, the driver does not fail a test.
Rule35: Under the condition that a driver requires a license, either a driver has a job or if the vehicle is not compliant, the vehicle uses a platform.
Rule36: Whenever a system locks a facility, the system triggers an alarm.
Rule37: Provided that a system activates a protocol, if the system notifies security, the system locks a facility.
Rule38: A system activates a protocol or a system escalates an alert.
Rule39: If a system escalates an alert, then if the system notifies security, the system locks a facility.
Rule40: Whenever a vehicle is operational, the vehicle is compliant.
Rule41: If a driver has access to a facility, then if the vehicle is not operational, the vehicle needs maintenance.
Rule42: Provided that a driver has permission for a facility, if the vehicle is not operational, the vehicle needs maintenance.
Rule43: If it is not the case that either a vehicle has a safety certificate or if the vehicle is insured, the vehicle is compliant, then the vehicle violates regulations.
Rule44: Under the condition that it is not the case that if a driver demonstrates sobriety, the driver shows sobriety, the driver fails a test.
Rule45: If it is not the case that if a manager administers a test, the driver does not fail a test, then the manager records a result.
Rule46: If it is not the case that if a supervisor monitors compliance of a vehicle, the supervisor reviews logs, it is not the case that the supervisor issues a warning.
Rule47: Under the condition that it is not the case that if an investigator conducts an investigation on a case, the investigator interviews witnesses, the investigator closes a case.
Rule48: Whenever it is not the case that if an investigator conducts an investigation on a case, the investigator interviews witnesses, it is not the case that the investigator closes a case.
Rule49: Under the condition that a vehicle is not compliant, the driver is sober.
Rule50: If a vehicle is not compliant, it is not the case that the vehicle uses a platform.
facts: Fact2: A manager administers a test.
Fact3: A device has connectivity to a network.
Fact4: An investigator conducts an investigation on a case.
Fact5: It is not the case that a driver is full time.
Fact6: A driver does not have a job.
Fact7: It is not the case that a vehicle has a safety certificate.
Fact8: A vehicle does not get fined.
Fact9: It is not the case that a manager records a result.
Fact10: A vehicle does not need maintenance.
